page.title: 04HOUSING IN HALBERTON
page.content: The {houses in the Halberton area} are really scruffy but most of them that are scruffy are in the High Street because of the traffic fumes which make them dirty,but some of the houses are beautiful.Some are thatched but most have slate roofs.The houses on the outskirts are quite nice and so are some in the centre of Halberton.Some of the houses in Halberton have plaster coming from the walls and on some of the doors there is rust . In Halberton there are{556 houses {and 24 farmhouses}but 2 of those are empty.There are{106 council houses {including flats and bungalows. {427 people}are registered on the electoral roll in Halberton.We estimated that also there are{75} children in Halberton.So the population is approximately{600.
